notes_translated.fr: Liste des contrats de 25 000 $ et + octroyés par le conseil d'arrondissement publiée annuellement. La liste couvre la période de juin à mai. Depuis 2017, la liste couvre la période du 1er janvier au 31 décembre. La liste est disponible uniquement en français pour les périodes suivantes : juin 2003 à mai 2004, juin 2011 à mai 2012, juin 2012 à mai 2013, juin 2013 à mai 2014 et 1er janvier au 31 décembre 2017. Aussi, la liste des contrats était incluse dans le rapport du Maire sur la situation financière jusqu'à la publication du rapport d'août 2007. Depuis, elle est publiée dans un document séparé.
notes_translated.en-t-fr: List of $25,000 and+ contracts awarded by the borough council published annually. The list covers the period from June to May. Since 2017, the list covers the period from 1 January to 31 December. The list is available only in French for the following periods: June 2003 to May 2004, June 2011 to May 2012, June 2012 to May 2013, June 2013 to May 2014 and January 1 to December 31, 2017. Also, the list of contracts was included in the Mayor's report on the financial situation until the August 2007 report was published. Since then, it has been published in a separate document.

notes: List of $25,000 and+ contracts awarded by the borough council published annually. The list covers the period from June to May. Since 2017, the list covers the period from 1 January to 31 December. The list is available only in French for the following periods: June 2003 to May 2004, June 2011 to May 2012, June 2012 to May 2013, June 2013 to May 2014 and January 1 to December 31, 2017. Also, the list of contracts was included in the Mayor's report on the financial situation until the August 2007 report was published. Since then, it has been published in a separate document.
